request.description:
Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| search | string | Search in product name and description |
| category_id | int | Filter by category ID |
| category | string | Filter by category slug |
| featured | boolean | Filter featured products (true/false) |
| min_price | float | Minimum price filter |
| max_price | float | Maximum price filter |
| has_variants | boolean | Filter products with/without variants |
| in_stock | boolean | Show only products in stock |
| sort | string | Sort order (see options below) |
| per_page | int | Items per page (1-100, default: 15) |
| page | int | Page number |

Sort Options

| Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| name or name_asc | Name A-Z |
| name_desc | Name Z-A |
| price_asc | Price low to high |
| price_desc | Price high to low |
| newest | Newest first |
| oldest | Oldest first |
| popular | Featured products first |

Example Requests

```
 1 │# Search for coffee products
 2 │GET /api/products?search=coffee
 3 │
 4 │# Filter by category
 5 │GET /api/products?category=beverages
 6 │GET /api/products?category_id=1
 7 │
 8 │# Price range
 9 │GET /api/products?min_price=2&max_price=10
10 │
11 │# Featured products sorted by price
12 │GET /api/products?featured=true&sort=price_asc
13 │
14 │# Products in stock with variants
15 │GET /api/products?in_stock=true&has_variants=true
16 │
17 │# Pagination
18 │GET /api/products?page=2&per_page=20
19 │
20 │# Combined filters
21 │GET /api/products?category=coffee&min_price=3&max_price=8&sort=price_asc&per_page=10

 ```

Response Format

```
 1 │{
 2 │  "success": true,
 3 │  "data": {
 4 │    "products": [...],
 5 │    "pagination": {
 6 │      "current_page": 1,
 7 │      "last_page": 5,
 8 │      "per_page": 15,
 9 │      "total": 72,
10 │      "from": 1,
11 │      "to": 15,
12 │      "has_more_pages": true
13 │    },
14 │    "filters": {
15 │      "search": "coffee",
16 │      "category": "beverages",
17 │      "sort": "price_asc"
18 │    }
19 │  }
20 │}

 ```
